sn35.124:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn35.124:4.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.124:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesāliko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.124:4.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.124:4.6: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.124:5.1: “Santi kho, gahapati, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.124:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.124:5.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.124:5.4: Saupādāno, gahapati, bhikkhu no parinibbāyati … pe …
sn35.124:5.5: santi kho, gahapati, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.124:5.6: santi kho, gahapati, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.124:5.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.124:5.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.124:5.10: Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti.
sn35.124:6.1: Santi ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.124:6.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.124:6.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.124:6.5: santi kho, gahapati, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.124:6.6: santi kho, gahapati, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.124:6.7: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato.
sn35.124:6.8: Na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.124:6.10: Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
